A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi was an epic\, emotional film with serious depth\, excellent acting\, good humor\, great action and was visually stunning. Some of Rian Johnson's shots & scenes were nearly perfect and breathtaking.

There were several points throughout the movie where I gasped\, or held my breath and even shed a tear. Mark Hamill deserves an Oscar Nomination period!  The take away for this is "Hope from Hopelessness."

Loved it in every measure\, behind ESB\, ANH\, & Rogue One for me\, slightly ahead of ROTJ.  I will be seeing it again soon!
